Title: Requires persons driving on a state expressway or thruway to pull over and seek assistance if their vehicle is unable to exceed thirty-five miles per hour
Summary: Requires persons driving on a state expressway route, state interstate route, or state thruway route to pull over and seek assistance if their vehicle is unable to exceed thirty-five miles per hour.
LawCode: Amd ยง1181, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring persons driving a vehicle that is unable to exceed thirty-five miles per hour on state expressways and thruways to pull over and seek assistance
